tasks.label: Build Debug
tasks.command: cd service/src && rm -rf Debug && mkdir Debug && cd Debug && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=/tmp/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake && make

tasks.label: Build Release
tasks.command: cd service/src && rm -rf Debug && mkdir Release && cd Release && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=/tmp/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake && make
